nodes.text: Bina was an Amani female who ran the Creature Stall in Black Spire Outpost, filled with creatures that she collected from around the galaxy and brought to Batuu. She also wrote a guidebook to Black Spire's creatures for younglings to encourage them to explore the outpost and discover and track some of its resident creatures.

Bina is one of many shopkeeper characters created for the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge theme park land. In February 2020, the Creature Stall began offering a free scavenger-hunt activity book, Bina's Guide to the Creatures of Batuu, for children ages 10 and under. After stamping the books at each location, the player would be rewarded with a special coaster token.
